issue.title: [CF 922] Blood DK Functional question/request
issue.body:
I would like to know if it is or if it will ever be possible to track the amount of damage my Blood DK has taken over the last 5 seconds to help optimize my Death Strike usage.

There is a thread on the DK Examples forum called "Blood Shield Optimizer" which I can only see at the top level of the forums (http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/forum/) that might contain information for me however when I click it my access to the thread is denied.  Sorry if this has been answered already, I really tried to look around!


> Posted by CurseForge user TuhMuffinMan | Imported from CurseForge issue #922 | Raw

comments.body:
This is not something that I ever plan on implementing, as I don't play a DK, and judging from the code of other addons that serve this purpose, there are far too many caveats and factors that change how much DS heals for me to be able to keep track of between patches and hotfixes.

You could always beseech one of the authors of the existing addons that do this to use their expertise to create an icon type for TellMeWhen using TMW's API: http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/pages/api/icon-type/


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
